00302 void GameInitBobbyRGuns()
00303 {
00304       guiTempCurrentMode=0;
00305 
00306       // WANNE
00307       guiPrevGunFilterMode = -1;
00308       guiPrevAmmoFilterMode = -1;
00309       guiPrevUsedFilterMode = -1;
00310 
00311       guiCurrentGunFilterMode = -1;
00312       guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = -1;
00313       guiCurrentUsedFilterMode = -1;
00314 
00315       memset(&BobbyRayPurchases, 0, MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT);
00316 }

00326 
00327 BOOLEAN EnterBobbyRGuns()
00328 {
00329   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00330 
00331       gfBigImageMouseRegionCreated = FALSE;
00332 
00333       // load the background graphic and add it
00334       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00335       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\gunbackground.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00336       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiGunBackground));
00337 
00338       // load the gunsgrid graphic and add it
00339       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00340       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\gunsgrid.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00341       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiGunsGrid));
00342 
00343       InitBobbyBrTitle();
00344 
00345       guiPrevGunFilterMode = -1;
00346       guiCurrentGunFilterMode = -1;
00347 
00348       // Search for all guns. Take NOT_GUN for all guns
00349       SetFirstLastPagesForNew( IC_BOBBY_GUN, guiCurrentGunFilterMode );
00350 
00351       //Draw menu bar
00352       InitBobbyMenuBar(); 
00353       InitBobbyRGunsFilterBar();
00354       
00355       // render once
00356       RenderBobbyRGuns( );
00357 
00358       return(TRUE);
00359 }
00360 
00361 void ExitBobbyRGuns()
00362 {
00363       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiGunBackground);
00364       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiGunsGrid);
00365       DeleteBobbyBrTitle();
00366       DeleteBobbyMenuBar();
00367 
00368       // WANNE
00369       DeleteBobbyRGunsFilter();
00370 
00371       DeleteMouseRegionForBigImage();
00372 
00373       giCurrentSubPage = gusCurWeaponIndex;
00374       guiLastBobbyRayPage = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_GUNS;
00375 }

00380 
00381 void RenderBobbyRGuns()
00382 {
00383   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00384 
00385       WebPageTileBackground(BOBBYR_NUM_HORIZONTAL_TILES, BOBBYR_NUM_VERTICAL_TILES, BOBBYR_BACKGROUND_WIDTH, BOBBYR_BACKGROUND_HEIGHT, guiGunBackground);
00386 
00387       // WANNE
00388       //Display title at top of page
00389       //DisplayBobbyRBrTitle();
00390 
00391       // GunForm
00392       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiGunsGrid);
00393       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, BOBBYR_GRIDLOC_X, BOBBYR_GRIDLOC_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00394 
00395       DisplayItemInfo( IC_BOBBY_GUN, guiCurrentGunFilterMode );
00396       UpdateButtonText(guiCurrentLaptopMode);
00397       UpdateGunFilterButtons(guiCurrentGunFilterMode, guiPrevGunFilterMode);
00398 
00399       MarkButtonsDirty( );
00400       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00401       //InvalidateRegion(0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
00402       InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00403       fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00404       fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;     
00405 }

00408 
00409 BOOLEAN DisplayBobbyRBrTitle()
00410 {
00411   HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00412 
00413       // BR title
00414       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiBrTitle);
00415   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, BOBBYR_BRTITLE_X, BOBBYR_BRTITLE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00416 
00417       // To Order Text
00418       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_TO_ORDER], BOBBYR_TO_ORDER_TITLE_X, BOBBYR_TO_ORDER_TITLE_Y, 0, BOBBYR_ORDER_TITLE_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00419 
00420       //First put a shadow behind the image
00421       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, BOBBYR_TO_ORDER_TEXT_X-2, BOBBYR_TO_ORDER_TEXT_Y-2, BOBBYR_TO_ORDER_TEXT_X+BOBBYR_TO_ORDER_TEXT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_TO_ORDER_TEXT_Y+31);
00422 
00423       //To Order text
00424       DisplayWrappedString(BOBBYR_TO_ORDER_TEXT_X, BOBBYR_TO_ORDER_TEXT_Y, BOBBYR_TO_ORDER_TEXT_WIDTH, 2, BOBBYR_ORDER_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_TEXT_COLOR, BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_CLICK_ON_ITEMS], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
00425 
00426       return(TRUE);
00427 }
00428 
00429 
00430 BOOLEAN InitBobbyBrTitle()
00431 {
00432   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00433 
00434       // load the br title graphic and add it
00435       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00436       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\br.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00437       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBrTitle));
00438 
00439       //initialize the link to the homepage by clicking on the title
00440       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedTitleImageLinkRegion, BOBBYR_BRTITLE_X, BOBBYR_BRTITLE_Y, (BOBBYR_BRTITLE_X + BOBBYR_BRTITLE_WIDTH), (UINT16)(BOBBYR_BRTITLE_Y + BOBBYR_BRTITLE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00441                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectTitleImageLinkRegionCallBack);
00442       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSelectedTitleImageLinkRegion ); 
00443       
00444 
00445       gusOldItemNumOnTopOfPage=65535;
00446 
00447       return(TRUE);
00448 }
00449 
00450 BOOLEAN DeleteBobbyBrTitle()
00451 {
00452       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBrTitle);
00453 
00454       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedTitleImageLinkRegion);
00455 
00456       DeleteMouseRegionForBigImage();
00457 
00458       return(TRUE);
00459 }
00460 
00461 
00462 void SelectTitleImageLinkRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00463 { 
00464       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
00465       {
00466       }
00467       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
00468       {
00469             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R;
00470       }
00471 }

00473 // WANNE
00474 BOOLEAN InitBobbyRGunsFilterBar()
00475 {
00476       UINT8 i;
00477       UINT16      usPosX;
00478       UINT8       bCurMode;
00479       UINT16      usYOffset = 0;
00480 
00481       bCurMode = 0;
00482       usPosX = FILTER_BUTTONS_GUN_START_X;
00483 
00484       guiBobbyRFilterImage =  LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\CatalogueButton1.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00485 
00486       // Loop through the filter buttons
00487       for(i=0; i<NUMBER_GUNS_FILTER_BUTTONS; i++)
00488       {
00489             // Next row
00490             if (i > 7)
00491             {
00492                   usPosX = FILTER_BUTTONS_GUN_START_X;
00493                   usYOffset = 25;
00494             }
00495 
00496             // Filter buttons
00497             guiBobbyRFilterGuns[i] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiBobbyRFilterImage, BobbyRFilter[BOBBYR_FILTER_GUNS_HEAVY+i], BOBBYR_GUNS_BUTTON_FONT, 
00498                                                                               BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_ON, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00499                                                                               BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_OFF, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00500                                                                               TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00501                                                                               usPosX, FILTER_BUTTONS_Y + usYOffset, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00502                                                                               DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnBobbyRFilterGunsCallback);
00503 
00504             SetButtonCursor(guiBobbyRFilterGuns[i], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00505 
00506             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiBobbyRFilterGuns[i], 0, ubFilterGunsButtonValues[bCurMode]);
00507 
00508             usPosX += BOBBYR_GUNS_FILTER_BUTTON_GAP;
00509             bCurMode++;
00510       }
00511       
00512 
00513       return(TRUE);
00514 }

00598 {
00599       UINT8 i;
00600       UINT16      usPosX;
00601       UINT8       bCurMode;
00602 
00603       // Previous button
00604       guiBobbyRPreviousPageImage = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\PreviousButton.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00605       guiBobbyRPreviousPage = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiBobbyRPreviousPageImage, BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_PREVIOUS_ITEMS], BOBBYR_GUNS_BUTTON_FONT, 
00606                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_ON, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00607                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_OFF, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00608                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00609                                                                                BOBBYR_PREVIOUS_BUTTON_X, BOBBYR_PREVIOUS_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00610                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnBobbyRNextPreviousPageCallback);
00611       SetButtonCursor(guiBobbyRPreviousPage, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00612       MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiBobbyRPreviousPage, 0, BOBBYR_PREVIOUS_PAGE);
00613       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiBobbyRPreviousPage, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED );
00614 
00615  
00616       guiBobbyRPageMenuImage =  LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\CatalogueButton1.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00617 
00618       // Next button
00619       guiBobbyRNextPageImage  = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\NextButton.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00620       guiBobbyRNextPage = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiBobbyRNextPageImage, BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_MORE_ITEMS], BOBBYR_GUNS_BUTTON_FONT, 
00621                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_ON, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00622                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_OFF, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00623                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00624                                                                                BOBBYR_NEXT_BUTTON_X, BOBBYR_NEXT_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00625                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnBobbyRNextPreviousPageCallback);
00626       SetButtonCursor(guiBobbyRNextPage, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00627       MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiBobbyRNextPage, 0, BOBBYR_NEXT_PAGE);

00629

00640                                                                                usPosX, BOBBYR_CATALOGUE_BUTTON_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00641                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnBobbyRPageMenuCallback);
00642 
00643             SetButtonCursor(guiBobbyRPageMenu[i], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00644 
00645             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiBobbyRPageMenu[i], 0, ubCatalogueButtonValues[bCurMode]);
00646

00648             bCurMode++;

00657                                                                                BOBBYR_ORDER_FORM_X, BOBBYR_ORDER_FORM_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,

00678 BOOLEAN DeleteBobbyRGunsFilter()
00679 {
00680       UINT8 i;
00681

00683 
00684       for (i=0; i<NUMBER_GUNS_FILTER_BUTTONS; i++)
00685       {
00686             RemoveButton (guiBobbyRFilterGuns[i]);
00687       }
00688 
00689       return (TRUE);
00690 }

00721 BOOLEAN DeleteBobbyMenuBar()
00722 {
00723       UINT8 i;
00724 
00725       UnloadButtonImage( guiBobbyRNextPageImage );
00726       UnloadButtonImage( guiBobbyRPreviousPageImage );
00727       UnloadButtonImage( guiBobbyRPageMenuImage );
00728       UnloadButtonImage( guiBobbyROrderFormImage );
00729       UnloadButtonImage( guiBobbyRHomeImage );
00730 
00731       RemoveButton( guiBobbyRNextPage );
00732       RemoveButton( guiBobbyRPreviousPage );
00733       RemoveButton( guiBobbyROrderForm );
00734       RemoveButton( guiBobbyRHome );
00735 
00736       for(i=0; i<NUM_CATALOGUE_BUTTONS; i++)
00737       {
00738             RemoveButton( guiBobbyRPageMenu[i] );
00739       }
00740 
00741       return(TRUE);
00742 }
00743 
00744 void BtnBobbyRPageMenuCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00745 {
00746       UINT32            bNewValue;
00747       bNewValue = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00748 
00749       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00750             return;
00751 
00752       //gbMessageDisplayed = TRUE;
00753 
00754       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00755       {
00756             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00757 
00758             guiTempCurrentMode = bNewValue;
00759 
00760             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00761       }
00762       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00763       {
00764             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00765 
00766             guiTempCurrentMode = BOBBYR_DEFAULT_MENU_COLOR;
00767             UpdateButtonText(guiCurrentLaptopMode);
00768       
00769             // Set the new category button
00770             guiCurrentLaptopMode = bNewValue;
00771 
00772             // Set no Filter!
00773             switch (bNewValue)
00774             {
00775                   case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_GUNS:
00776                         guiPrevGunFilterMode = guiCurrentGunFilterMode;
00777                         guiCurrentGunFilterMode = -1;
00778                         UpdateGunFilterButtons(guiCurrentGunFilterMode, guiPrevGunFilterMode);
00779                         SetFirstLastPagesForNew(IC_BOBBY_GUN, guiCurrentGunFilterMode);
00780                         break;
00781                   case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_AMMO:
00782                         guiPrevAmmoFilterMode = guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode;
00783                         guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = -1;
00784                         UpdateAmmoFilterButtons(guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode, guiPrevAmmoFilterMode);
00785                         SetFirstLastPagesForNew(IC_AMMO, guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode);
00786                         break;
00787                   case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_ARMOR:
00788                         guiPrevArmourFilterMode = guiCurrentArmourFilterMode;
00789                         guiCurrentArmourFilterMode = -1;
00790                         // TODO
00791                         //UpdateAmmoFilterButtons(guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode, guiPrevAmmoFilterMode);
00792                         SetFirstLastPagesForNew(IC_ARMOUR, guiCurrentArmourFilterMode);
00793                         break;
00794                   case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_MISC:
00795                         guiPrevMiscFilterMode = guiCurrentMiscFilterMode;
00796                         guiCurrentMiscFilterMode = -1;
00797                         // TODO
00798                         //UpdateAmmoFilterButtons(guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode, guiPrevAmmoFilterMode);
00799                         SetFirstLastPagesForNew(IC_BOBBY_MISC, guiCurrentMiscFilterMode);
00800                         break;
00801                   case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_USED:
00802                         guiPrevUsedFilterMode = guiCurrentUsedFilterMode;
00803                         guiCurrentUsedFilterMode = -1;
00804 
00805                         EnableButton(guiBobbyRFilterAmmo[0]);
00806                         EnableButton(guiBobbyRFilterAmmo[1]);
00807                         EnableButton(guiBobbyRFilterAmmo[2]);
00808                         EnableButton(guiBobbyRFilterAmmo[3]);
00809 
00810                         SetFirstLastPagesForUsed(guiCurrentUsedFilterMode);
00811                         break;
00812             }     
00813       }
00814 
00815       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00816       {
00817             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00818             guiTempCurrentMode = BOBBYR_DEFAULT_MENU_COLOR;
00819             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00820       }
00821 } 
00822 
00823 
00824 // WANNE
00825 void BtnBobbyRFilterGunsCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00826 {
00827       UINT32            bNewValue;
00828       bNewValue = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00829 
00830       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00831             return;
00832 
00833       //gbMessageDisplayed = TRUE;
00834 
00835       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00836       {
00837             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00838 
00839             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00840       }
00841       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00842       {
00843             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00844 
00845             guiPrevGunFilterMode = guiCurrentGunFilterMode;
00846 
00847             switch (bNewValue)
00848             {
00849                   // TODO: Add a new button "Heavy Weapons" (Weapon Type = NOT_GUN
00850                   // ItemClass = IC_LAUNCHER. (IC_LAUNCHER is already included in IC_BOBBY_GUN!)
00851                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_GUNS_HEAVY:
00852                         guiCurrentGunFilterMode = NOT_GUN;
00853                         break;
00854                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_GUNS_PISTOL:
00855                         guiCurrentGunFilterMode = GUN_PISTOL;
00856                         break;
00857                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_GUNS_M_PISTOL:
00858                         guiCurrentGunFilterMode = GUN_M_PISTOL;
00859                         break;
00860                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_GUNS_SMG:
00861                         guiCurrentGunFilterMode = GUN_SMG;
00862                         break;
00863                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_GUNS_RIFLE:
00864                         guiCurrentGunFilterMode = GUN_RIFLE;
00865                         break;
00866                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_GUNS_SN_RIFLE:
00867                         guiCurrentGunFilterMode = GUN_SN_RIFLE;
00868                         break;
00869                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_GUNS_AS_RIFLE:
00870                         guiCurrentGunFilterMode = GUN_AS_RIFLE;
00871                         break;
00872                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_GUNS_LMG:
00873                         guiCurrentGunFilterMode = GUN_LMG;
00874                         break;
00875                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_GUNS_SHOTGUN:
00876                         guiCurrentGunFilterMode = GUN_SHOTGUN;
00877                         break;
00878             }     
00879 
00880             //if (guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode > -1)
00881             {
00882                   SetFirstLastPagesForNew(IC_BOBBY_GUN, guiCurrentGunFilterMode);
00883             }
00884             
00885             UpdateGunFilterButtons(guiCurrentGunFilterMode, guiPrevGunFilterMode);
00886             
00887             DeleteMouseRegionForBigImage();
00888             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00889             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00890       }
00891       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00892       {
00893             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00894             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00895       }
00896 }

00898 // WANNE
00899 void BtnBobbyRFilterAmmoCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00900 {
00901       UINT32            bNewValue;
00902       bNewValue = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00903 
00904       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00905             return;
00906 
00907       //gbMessageDisplayed = TRUE;
00908 
00909       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00910       {
00911             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00912             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00913       }
00914       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00915       {
00916             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00917 
00918             guiPrevAmmoFilterMode = guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode;
00919             
00920             switch (bNewValue)
00921             {
00922                   //case BOBBYR_FILTER_AMMO_HEAVY:
00923                   //    guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = NOT_GUN;
00924                   //    break;
00925                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_AMMO_PISTOL:
00926                         guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = GUN_PISTOL;
00927                         break;
00928                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_AMMO_M_PISTOL:
00929                         guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = GUN_M_PISTOL;
00930                         break;
00931                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_AMMO_SMG:
00932                         guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = GUN_SMG;
00933                         break;
00934                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_AMMO_RIFLE:
00935                         guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = GUN_RIFLE;
00936                         break;
00937                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_AMMO_SN_RIFLE:
00938                         guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = GUN_SN_RIFLE;
00939                         break;
00940                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_AMMO_AS_RIFLE:
00941                         guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = GUN_AS_RIFLE;
00942                         break;
00943                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_AMMO_LMG:
00944                         guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = GUN_LMG;
00945                         break;
00946                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_AMMO_SHOTGUN:
00947                         guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode = GUN_SHOTGUN;
00948                         break;
00949             }
00950 
00951             SetFirstLastPagesForNew(IC_AMMO, guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode);
00952             UpdateAmmoFilterButtons(guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode, guiPrevAmmoFilterMode);
00953 
00954             DeleteMouseRegionForBigImage();
00955             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00956             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00957       }
00958       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00959       {
00960             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00961             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00962       }
00963 }

00966 // WANNE
00967 void BtnBobbyRFilterUsedCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00968 {
00969       UINT32            bNewValue;
00970       bNewValue = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
00971 
00972       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00973             return;
00974 
00975       //gbMessageDisplayed = TRUE;
00976 
00977       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00978       {
00979             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00980             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00981       }
00982       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00983       {
00984             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00985 
00986             guiPrevUsedFilterMode = guiCurrentUsedFilterMode;
00987             
00988             switch (bNewValue)
00989             {
00990                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_USED_GUNS:
00991                         guiCurrentUsedFilterMode = IC_BOBBY_GUN;
00992                         break;
00993                   //case BOBBYR_FILTER_USED_AMMO:
00994                   //    guiCurrentUsedFilterMode = IC_AMMO;
00995                   //    break;
00996                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_USED_ARMOR:
00997                         guiCurrentUsedFilterMode = IC_ARMOUR;
00998                         break;
00999                   case BOBBYR_FILTER_USED_MISC:
01000                         guiCurrentUsedFilterMode = IC_BOBBY_MISC;
01001                         break;
01002             }
01003 
01004             UpdateUsedFilterButtons();
01005             SetFirstLastPagesForUsed(guiCurrentUsedFilterMode);
01006             
01007             DeleteMouseRegionForBigImage();
01008             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
01009             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
01010       }
01011       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01012       {
01013             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01014             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01015       }
01016 } 
01017 
01018 
01019 
01020 void BtnBobbyRNextPreviousPageCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01021 {
01022       UINT32            bNewValue;
01023 
01024       bNewValue = MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
01025 
01026       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01027       {
01028             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01029 
01030             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01031       }
01032       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01033       {
01034             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01035             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01036 
01037 
01038             //if previous screen
01039             if( bNewValue == BOBBYR_PREVIOUS_PAGE)
01040             {
01041                   if( gubCurPage > 0 )
01042                         gubCurPage--;
01043             }
01044             //else next screen
01045             else
01046             {
01047                   if( gubCurPage < gubNumPages-1 )
01048                         gubCurPage++;
01049             }
01050 
01051 
01052             DeleteMouseRegionForBigImage();
01053 
01054             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
01055             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;           
01056       }
01057       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01058       {
01059             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01060             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01061       }
01062 } 
01063 
01064 
01065 BOOLEAN DisplayItemInfo(UINT32 uiItemClass, INT32 iFilter)
01066 {
01067       UINT16      i;
01068       UINT8       ubCount=0;
01069       UINT16      PosY, usTextPosY;
01070       UINT16            ubFirstIndex=0;
01071       UINT16      usItemIndex;
01072       wchar_t     sDollarTemp[60];
01073       wchar_t     sTemp[60];
01074       INT16       pItemNumbers[ BOBBYR_NUM_WEAPONS_ON_PAGE ];
01075       BOOLEAN           bAddItem = FALSE;
01076 
01077       PosY = BOBBYR_GRID_PIC_Y;
01078       usTextPosY = BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_START_Y;
01079 
01080 //    InitFirstAndLastGlobalIndex( uiItemClass );
01081 
01082       //if there are no items then return
01083       if( gusFirstItemIndex == BOBBYR_NO_ITEMS )
01084       {
01085             if( fExitingLaptopFlag )
01086                   return( TRUE );
01087 
01088             DisableBobbyRButtons();
01089 
01090             if (gbMessageDisplayed == FALSE)
01091             {
01092                   //Display a popup saying we are out of stock
01093                   DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, BobbyRText[ BOBBYR_NO_MORE_STOCK ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, OutOfStockMessageBoxCallBack );
01094 
01095                   gbMessageDisplayed = TRUE;
01096             }
01097             return( TRUE );
01098       }
01099 
01100 
01101       if( uiItemClass == BOBBYR_USED_ITEMS )
01102             CalcFirstIndexForPage( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory, uiItemClass );
01103       else
01104             CalcFirstIndexForPage( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory, uiItemClass );
01105 
01106       DisableBobbyRButtons();
01107 
01108       if( gusOldItemNumOnTopOfPage != gusCurWeaponIndex )
01109       {
01110             DeleteMouseRegionForBigImage();
01111 
01112       }
01113 
01114 
01115 
01116       for(i=gusCurWeaponIndex; ((i<=gusLastItemIndex) && (ubCount < 4)); i++)
01117       {
01118             bAddItem = FALSE;
01119 
01120             if( uiItemClass == BOBBYR_USED_ITEMS )
01121             {
01122                   //If there is not items in stock
01123                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand == 0 )
01124                         continue;
01125 
01126                   usItemIndex = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].usItemIndex;
01127                   gfOnUsedPage = TRUE;
01128             }
01129             else
01130             {
01131                   //If there is not items in stock
01132                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand == 0 )
01133                         continue;
01134 
01135                   usItemIndex = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].usItemIndex;
01136                   gfOnUsedPage = FALSE;
01137             }
01138 
01139             // skip items that aren't of the right item class
01140             if( ! ( Item[ usItemIndex ].usItemClass & uiItemClass ) )
01141             {
01142                   continue;
01143             }
01144 
01145             // No Filter -> Take all
01146             if (iFilter == -1)
01147             {
01148                   bAddItem = TRUE;
01149             }
01150 
01151             pItemNumbers[ ubCount ] = usItemIndex;
01152 
01153             switch( Item[ usItemIndex ].usItemClass )
01154             {
01155                   case IC_GUN:
01156                   case IC_LAUNCHER:
01157                         // Used
01158                         if (uiItemClass == BOBBYR_USED_ITEMS)
01159                         {
01160                               if (iFilter > -1)
01161                               {
01162                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_GUN ||
01163                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER)
01164                                     {
01165                                           bAddItem = TRUE;
01166                                     }
01167                               }
01168                         }
01169                         // Guns
01170                         else
01171                         {
01172                               if (iFilter > -1)
01173                               {
01174                                     if (Weapon[ Item[usItemIndex].ubClassIndex ].ubWeaponType == iFilter)
01175                                     {
01176                                           bAddItem = TRUE;
01177                                     }
01178                               }
01179                         }
01180 
01181                         if (bAddItem == TRUE)
01182                         {
01183                               gusItemNumberForItemsOnScreen[ ubCount ] = i;
01184 
01185                               DisplayBigItemImage( usItemIndex, PosY);
01186                         
01187                               //Display Items Name
01188                               DisplayItemNameAndInfo(usTextPosY, usItemIndex, i, gfOnUsedPage);
01189 
01190                               DisplayGunInfo(usItemIndex, usTextPosY, gfOnUsedPage, i);
01191 
01192                               PosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
01193                               usTextPosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
01194                               ubCount++;
01195                         }
01196                         break;
01197 
01198                   case IC_AMMO:
01199                         // USED
01200                         if (uiItemClass == BOBBYR_USED_ITEMS)
01201                         {
01202                               if (iFilter > -1)
01203                               {
01204                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == iFilter)
01205                                     {
01206                                           bAddItem = TRUE;
01207                                     }
01208                               }
01209                         }
01210                         // AMMO
01211                         else
01212                         {
01213                               if (iFilter > -1)
01214                               {
01215                                     if (IsAmmoMatchinWeaponType(usItemIndex, iFilter))
01216                                     {
01217                                           bAddItem = TRUE;
01218                                     }
01219                               }
01220                         }
01221 
01222                         if (bAddItem == TRUE)
01223                         {
01224                               gusItemNumberForItemsOnScreen[ ubCount ] = i;
01225 
01226                               DisplayBigItemImage( usItemIndex, PosY);
01227                   
01228                               //Display Items Name
01229                               DisplayItemNameAndInfo(usTextPosY, usItemIndex, i, gfOnUsedPage);
01230 
01231                               DisplayAmmoInfo( usItemIndex, usTextPosY, gfOnUsedPage, i);
01232 
01233                               PosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
01234                               usTextPosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
01235                               ubCount++;
01236                         }
01237                         break;
01238 
01239                   case IC_ARMOUR:
01240                         // USED
01241                         if (uiItemClass == BOBBYR_USED_ITEMS)
01242                         {
01243                               if (iFilter > -1)
01244                               {
01245                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == iFilter)
01246                                     {
01247                                           bAddItem = TRUE;
01248                                     }
01249                               }
01250                         }
01251                         // ARMOUR
01252                         else
01253                         {
01254                               if (iFilter > -1)
01255                               {
01256                                     // TODO
01257                               }
01258                         }
01259 
01260                         if (bAddItem == TRUE)
01261                         {
01262                               gusItemNumberForItemsOnScreen[ ubCount ] = i;
01263 
01264                               DisplayBigItemImage( usItemIndex, PosY);
01265                         
01266                               //Display Items Name
01267                               DisplayItemNameAndInfo(usTextPosY, usItemIndex, i, gfOnUsedPage);
01268 
01269                               DisplayArmourInfo( usItemIndex, usTextPosY, gfOnUsedPage, i);
01270 
01271                               PosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
01272                               usTextPosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
01273                               ubCount++;
01274                         }
01275                         break;
01276 
01277                   case IC_BLADE:
01278                   case IC_THROWING_KNIFE:
01279                   case IC_PUNCH:
01280                         // USED
01281                         if (uiItemClass == BOBBYR_USED_ITEMS)
01282                         {
01283                               if (iFilter > -1)
01284                               {
01285                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_BLADE ||
01286                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE ||
01287                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_PUNCH)
01288                                     {
01289                                           bAddItem = TRUE;
01290                                     }
01291                               }
01292                         }
01293                         // MISC
01294                         else
01295                         {
01296                               if (iFilter > -1)
01297                               {
01298                                     // TODO
01299                               }
01300                         }
01301 
01302                         if (bAddItem == TRUE)
01303                         {
01304                               gusItemNumberForItemsOnScreen[ ubCount ] = i;
01305 
01306                               DisplayBigItemImage( usItemIndex, PosY);
01307                         
01308                               //Display Items Name
01309                               DisplayItemNameAndInfo(usTextPosY, usItemIndex, i, gfOnUsedPage);
01310 
01311                               DisplayNonGunWeaponInfo(usItemIndex, usTextPosY, gfOnUsedPage, i);
01312 
01313                               PosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
01314                               usTextPosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
01315                               ubCount++;
01316                         }
01317                         break;
01318 
01319                   case IC_GRENADE:
01320                   case IC_BOMB:
01321                   case IC_MISC:
01322                   case IC_MEDKIT:
01323                   case IC_KIT:
01324                   case IC_FACE:
01325                         // USED
01326                         if (uiItemClass == BOBBYR_USED_ITEMS)
01327                         {
01328                               if (iFilter > -1)
01329                               {
01330                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_GRENADE ||
01331                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_BOMB ||
01332                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_MISC ||
01333                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_MEDKIT ||
01334                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_KIT ||
01335                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_FACE)
01336                                     {
01337                                           bAddItem = TRUE;
01338                                     }
01339                               }
01340                         }
01341                         // MISC
01342                         else
01343                         {
01344                               if (iFilter > -1)
01345                               {
01346                                     // TODO
01347                               }
01348                         }
01349 
01350                         if (bAddItem == TRUE)
01351                         {
01352                               gusItemNumberForItemsOnScreen[ ubCount ] = i;
01353 
01354                               DisplayBigItemImage( usItemIndex, PosY);
01355                         
01356                               //Display Items Name
01357                               DisplayItemNameAndInfo(usTextPosY, usItemIndex, i, gfOnUsedPage);
01358 
01359                               DisplayMiscInfo( usItemIndex, usTextPosY, gfOnUsedPage, i);
01360 
01361                               PosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
01362                               usTextPosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
01363                               ubCount++;
01364                         }
01365                         break;
01366             }
01367       }
01368 
01369       if( gusOldItemNumOnTopOfPage != gusCurWeaponIndex )
01370       {
01371             CreateMouseRegionForBigImage(BOBBYR_GRID_PIC_Y, ubCount, pItemNumbers );
01372       
01373             gusOldItemNumOnTopOfPage = gusCurWeaponIndex;
01374       }
01375 
01376       //Display the subtotal at the bottom of the screen
01377       swprintf( sDollarTemp, L"%d", CalculateTotalPurchasePrice() );
01378       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sDollarTemp );
01379       InsertDollarSignInToString( sDollarTemp );
01380       swprintf( sTemp, L"%s %s", BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_SUB_TOTAL], sDollarTemp );
01381       DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, BOBBYR_ORDER_SUBTOTAL_X, BOBBYR_ORDER_SUBTOTAL_Y, 0, BOBBYR_ORDER_TITLE_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED | TEXT_SHADOWED);
01382 
01383       //Display the Used item disclaimer
01384       if( gfOnUsedPage )
01385       {
01386             DrawTextToScreen( BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_PERCENT_FUNCTIONAL], BOBBYR_PERCENT_FUNTCIONAL_X, BOBBYR_PERCENT_FUNTCIONAL_Y, 0, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED | TEXT_SHADOWED);
01387       }
01388 
01389       return(TRUE);
01390 }

01392 
01393 BOOLEAN DisplayGunInfo(UINT16 usIndex, UINT16 usTextPosY, BOOLEAN fUsed, UINT16 usBobbyIndex)
01394 {
01395       UINT16      usHeight;
01396       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
01397       UINT16 usFontHeight;
01398       usFontHeight = GetFontHeight(BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT);
01399 
01400       //Display Items Name
01401       //DisplayItemNameAndInfo(usTextPosY, usIndex, fUsed);
01402 
01403       usHeight = usTextPosY;
01404       //Display the weight, caliber, mag, rng, dam, rof text
01405 
01406       //Weight
01407       usHeight = DisplayWeight(usHeight, usIndex, usFontHeight);
01408 
01409       //Caliber
01410       usHeight = DisplayCaliber(usHeight, usIndex, usFontHeight);
01411 
01412       //Magazine
01413       usHeight = DisplayMagazine(usHeight, usIndex, usFontHeight);
01414 
01415       //Range
01416       usHeight = DisplayRange(usHeight, usIndex, usFontHeight);
01417       
01418       //Damage
01419       usHeight = DisplayDamage(usHeight, usIndex, usFontHeight);
01420 
01421       //ROF
01422       usHeight = DisplayRof(usHeight, usIndex, usFontHeight);
01423 
01424       //Display the Cost and the qty bought and on hand
01425       usHeight = DisplayCostAndQty(usTextPosY, usIndex, usFontHeight, usBobbyIndex, fUsed);
01426 
01427       return(TRUE);
01428 } //DisplayGunInfo

01482 
01483 BOOLEAN DisplayBigItemImage(UINT16 usIndex, UINT16 PosY)
01484 {
01485       INT16             PosX, sCenX, sCenY;
01486       UINT32                  usHeight, usWidth;
01487   ETRLEObject     *pTrav;
01488       INVTYPE                 *pItem;
01489       UINT32            uiImage;
01490   HVOBJECT  hPixHandle;
01491 
01492       PosX = BOBBYR_GRID_PIC_X;
01493 
01494       pItem = &Item[ usIndex ];
01495       LoadTileGraphicForItem(pItem, &uiImage);
01496 
01497       GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, uiImage);
01498       pTrav = &(hPixHandle->pETRLEObject[0]);
01499 
01500       //center picture in frame
01501       usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
01502       usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
01503 //    sCenX = PosX + ( abs( BOBBYR_GRID_PIC_WIDTH - usWidth ) / 2 );
01504 //    sCenY = PosY + 8;
01505       sCenX = PosX + ( abs( BOBBYR_GRID_PIC_WIDTH - usWidth ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetX;
01506       sCenY = PosY + 8;
01507 
01508 
01509       //blt the shadow of the item
01510       if(gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_ITEM_SHADOW ]) BltVideoObjectOutlineShadowFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, uiImage, 0, sCenX-2, sCenY+2);//pItem->ubGraphicNum
01511 
01512       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, sCenX, sCenY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01513       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(uiImage);
01514 
01515       return(TRUE);
01516 }
01517

01559 
01560 UINT16 DisplayCostAndQty(UINT16 usPosY, UINT16 usIndex, UINT16 usFontHeight, UINT16 usBobbyIndex, BOOLEAN fUsed)
01561 {
01562       wchar_t     sTemp[20];
01563 //    UINT8 ubPurchaseNumber;
01564 
01565       //
01566       //Display the cost and the qty
01567       //
01568 
01569       //Display the cost
01570       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_COST], BOBBYR_ITEM_COST_TEXT_X, (UINT16)usPosY, BOBBYR_ITEM_COST_TEXT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01571       usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01572 
01573       swprintf(sTemp, L"%d", CalcBobbyRayCost( usIndex, usBobbyIndex, fUsed ));
01574       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTemp );
01575       InsertDollarSignInToString( sTemp );
01576 
01577       DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, BOBBYR_ITEM_COST_NUM_X, (UINT16)usPosY, BOBBYR_ITEM_COST_TEXT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
01578       usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01579 
01580 
01581 
01582 /*
01583       //Display the # bought
01584       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_QTY_ON_ORDER], BOBBYR_ITEM_QTY_TEXT_X, (UINT16)usPosY, BOBBYR_ITEM_COST_TEXT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01585       usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01586 
01587       ubPurchaseNumber = CheckIfItemIsPurchased(usBobbyIndex);
01588       if( ubPurchaseNumber == BOBBY_RAY_NOT_PURCHASED)
01589             swprintf(sTemp, L"% 4d", 0);
01590       else
01591             swprintf(sTemp, L"% 4d", BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased);
01592 
01593       DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, BOBBYR_ITEMS_BOUGHT_X, (UINT16)usPosY, BOBBYR_ITEM_COST_TEXT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
01594 */
01595 
01596       //Display Weight Number
01597       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_WGHT], BOBBYR_ITEM_STOCK_TEXT_X, (UINT16)(usPosY), BOBBYR_ITEM_COST_TEXT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01598       usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01599 
01600 
01601       swprintf( sTemp, L"%3.2f", GetWeightBasedOnMetricOption( Item[ usIndex ].ubWeight ) / (FLOAT)( 10.0 ) );
01602       DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, BOBBYR_ITEM_STOCK_TEXT_X, (UINT16)(usPosY), BOBBYR_ITEM_COST_TEXT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
01603       usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01604 
01605 
01606       //Display the # In Stock
01607       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_IN_STOCK], BOBBYR_ITEM_STOCK_TEXT_X, (UINT16)usPosY, BOBBYR_ITEM_COST_TEXT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01608       usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01609 
01610       if( fUsed )
01611             swprintf(sTemp, L"% 4d", LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ usBobbyIndex ].ubQtyOnHand);
01612       else
01613             swprintf(sTemp, L"% 4d", LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ usBobbyIndex ].ubQtyOnHand);
01614 
01615       DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, BOBBYR_ITEM_STOCK_TEXT_X, (UINT16)usPosY, BOBBYR_ITEM_COST_TEXT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
01616       usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01617 
01618 
01619       return(usPosY);
01620 }

01638 
01639 UINT16 DisplayDamage(UINT16 usPosY, UINT16 usIndex, UINT16 usFontHeight)
01640 {
01641       wchar_t     sTemp[20];
01642       UINT16 gunDamage = 0;
01643       
01644       if ( Item[ usIndex ].usItemClass == IC_GUN || Item[ usIndex ].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER )
01645       {
01646             gunDamage = (UINT16)( Weapon[ usIndex ].ubImpact + ( (double) Weapon[ usIndex ].ubImpact / 100) * gGameExternalOptions.ubGunDamageMultiplier );
01647       }
01648       else
01649       {
01650             gunDamage = (UINT16)( Weapon[ usIndex ].ubImpact + ( (double) Weapon[ usIndex ].ubImpact / 100) * gGameExternalOptions.ubMeleeDamageMultiplier );
01651       }
01652 
01653       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyRText[BOBBYR_GUNS_DAMAGE], BOBBYR_ITEM_WEIGHT_TEXT_X, (UINT16)usPosY, 0, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01654       swprintf(sTemp, L"%4d", gunDamage);
01655       DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, BOBBYR_ITEM_WEIGHT_NUM_X, (UINT16)usPosY, BOBBYR_ITEM_WEIGHT_NUM_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
01656       usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01657       return(usPosY);
01658 }

01728 void DisplayItemNameAndInfo(UINT16 usPosY, UINT16 usIndex, UINT16 usBobbyIndex, BOOLEAN fUsed)

01742

01747

01754

01756             {

01758                   DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, BOBBYR_ITEMS_BOUGHT_X, (UINT16)usPosY, 0, FONT14ARIAL, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01759             }

01761 
01762 
01763 
01764

01769             DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, (UINT16)(BOBBYR_ITEM_NAME_X-2), (UINT16)(usPosY - BOBBYR_ORDER_NUM_Y_OFFSET), BOBBYR_ORDER_NUM_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ITEM_NAME_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ITEM_NAME_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01770       }
01771 
01772       //Display Items description
01773       //uiStartLoc = (BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_FILE_SIZE * usIndex) + BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_NAME_SIZE;
01774       //LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(BOBBYRDESCFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_INFO_SIZE);
01775       LoadBRDesc(usIndex,sText);
01776       DisplayWrappedString(BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_START_X, usPosY, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_START_WIDTH, 2, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_TEXT_COLOR, sText, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01777 }

01833 
01834 
01835 //Loops through Bobby Rays Inventory to find the first and last index 
01836 void SetFirstLastPagesForNew( UINT32 uiClassMask, INT32 iFilter )
01837 {
01838       UINT16      i;
01839       INT16 sFirst = -1;
01840       INT16 sLast = -1;
01841       UINT16      ubPages=0;
01842       UINT16      ubNumItems=0;
01843       UINT16      usItemIndex = 0;
01844 
01845       BOOLEAN bCntNumItems = FALSE;
01846 
01847       gubCurPage = 0;
01848 
01849       //First loop through to get the first and last index indexs
01850       for(i=0; i<MAXITEMS; i++)
01851       {
01852             //If we have some of the inventory on hand
01853             if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand != 0 )
01854             {
01855                   if( Item[ LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].usItemIndex ].usItemClass & uiClassMask )
01856                   {
01857                         // No Filter -> Take all
01858                         if (iFilter == -1)
01859                         {
01860                               bCntNumItems = TRUE;
01861                         }
01862                         // Filter!
01863                         else
01864                         {
01865                               bCntNumItems = FALSE;
01866 
01867                               // Get the weapon from the item
01868                               usItemIndex = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].usItemIndex;
01869 
01870                               switch (uiClassMask)
01871                               {
01872                                     // Guns
01873                                     case IC_BOBBY_GUN:
01874                                           if (Weapon[ Item[usItemIndex].ubClassIndex ].ubWeaponType == iFilter)
01875                                           {
01876                                                 bCntNumItems = TRUE;
01877                                           }
01878                                           break;
01879                                     // Ammo
01880                                     case IC_AMMO:
01881                                           //if (Weapon[ Item[usItemIndex].ubClassIndex ].ubWeaponType == uiFilter)
01882                                           {
01883                                                 if (IsAmmoMatchinWeaponType(usItemIndex, guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode))
01884                                                 {
01885                                                       bCntNumItems = TRUE;
01886                                                 }
01887                                           }
01888                                           break;
01889                                           
01890                               }
01891                         }
01892 
01893                         if (bCntNumItems == TRUE)
01894                         {
01895                               ubNumItems++;
01896 
01897                               if( sFirst == -1 )
01898                                     sFirst = i;
01899                               sLast = i;
01900                         }
01901                   }
01902             }
01903       }
01904 
01905       if( ubNumItems == 0 )
01906       {
01907             gbMessageDisplayed = FALSE;
01908             gusFirstItemIndex = BOBBYR_NO_ITEMS;
01909             gusLastItemIndex = BOBBYR_NO_ITEMS;
01910             gubNumPages = 0;
01911             return;
01912       }
01913       
01914       gusFirstItemIndex = (UINT16)sFirst;
01915       gusLastItemIndex = (UINT16)sLast;
01916       gubNumPages = (UINT8)( ubNumItems / (FLOAT)BOBBYR_NUM_WEAPONS_ON_PAGE );
01917       if( (ubNumItems % BOBBYR_NUM_WEAPONS_ON_PAGE ) != 0 )
01918             gubNumPages += 1;
01919 }
01920 
01921 //Loops through Bobby Rays Used Inventory to find the first and last index 
01922 void SetFirstLastPagesForUsed(INT32 iFilter)
01923 {
01924       UINT16 i;
01925       INT16 sFirst = -1;
01926       INT16 sLast = -1;
01927       UINT16      ubPages=0;
01928       UINT16      ubNumItems=0;
01929       UINT16      usItemIndex;
01930       INT32 iFilterLauncher = IC_LAUNCHER;
01931 
01932       gubCurPage = 0;
01933       BOOLEAN bCntNumItems = FALSE;
01934 
01935 
01936       //First loop through to get the first and last index indexs
01937       for(i=0; i<MAXITEMS; i++)
01938       {
01939             //If we have some of the inventory on hand
01940             if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand != 0 )
01941             {
01942                   // No Filter -> Take all
01943                   if (iFilter == -1)
01944                   {
01945                         bCntNumItems = TRUE;
01946                   }
01947                   else
01948                   {
01949                         // Get the weapon from the item
01950                         usItemIndex = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ i ].usItemIndex;
01951 
01952                         switch (iFilter)
01953                         {
01954                               case IC_BOBBY_GUN:
01955                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_GUN ||
01956                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER)
01957                                     {
01958                                           bCntNumItems = TRUE;
01959                                     }
01960                                     break;
01961                               case IC_AMMO:
01962                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_AMMO)
01963                                     {
01964                                           bCntNumItems = TRUE;
01965                                     }
01966                                     break;
01967                               case IC_ARMOUR:
01968                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_ARMOUR)
01969                                     {
01970                                           bCntNumItems = TRUE;
01971                                     }
01972                                     break;
01973                               case IC_BOBBY_MISC:
01974                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_BLADE ||
01975                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE ||
01976                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_PUNCH ||
01977                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_GRENADE ||
01978                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_BOMB ||
01979                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_MISC ||
01980                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_MEDKIT ||
01981                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_KIT ||
01982                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_FACE)
01983                                     {
01984                                           bCntNumItems = TRUE;
01985                                     }
01986                                     break;
01987                         }
01988                   }
01989 
01990                   if (bCntNumItems == TRUE)
01991                   {
01992                         ubNumItems++;
01993 
01994                         if( sFirst == -1 )
01995                               sFirst = i;
01996                         sLast = i;
01997                   }
01998             }
01999       }
02000       if( sFirst == -1 )
02001       {
02002             gbMessageDisplayed = FALSE;
02003             gusFirstItemIndex = BOBBYR_NO_ITEMS;
02004             gusLastItemIndex = BOBBYR_NO_ITEMS;
02005             gubNumPages = 0;
02006             return;
02007       }
02008 
02009       gusFirstItemIndex = (UINT16)sFirst;
02010       gusLastItemIndex = (UINT16)sLast;
02011       gubNumPages = (UINT8)( ubNumItems / (FLOAT)BOBBYR_NUM_WEAPONS_ON_PAGE );
02012       if( (ubNumItems % BOBBYR_NUM_WEAPONS_ON_PAGE ) != 0 )
02013             gubNumPages += 1;
02014 }

02075                   //}

02078                   //if ( Item[ pItemNumbers[ i ] ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )

02091                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 5 ],                          //AP String

02143

02147                               Weapon[ pItemNumbers[ i ] ].bAccuracy,    //Accuracy

02205                         ubItemCount = CheckPlayersInventoryForGunMatchingGivenAmmoID( pItemNumbers[ i ] );
02206                         if( ubItemCount != 0 )

02221

02223                               ItemNames[ pItemNumbers[ i ] ],

02225                               explDamage,                         //Expl damage
02226                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 13 ],       //Stun Damage String
02227                               explStunDamage,                     //Stun Damage
02228                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],       //Weight String
02229                               fWeight,                            //Weight
02230                               GetWeightUnitString()         //Weight units
02231                               );
02232                   }
02233                   break;
02234 
02235             case IC_ARMOUR:
02236                   //Armor
02237                   //if (Item[ pItemNumbers[ i ] ].usItemClass == IC_ARMOUR)
02238                   {
02239                         INT32 iProtection = Armour[ Item[ pItemNumbers[ i ] ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
02240 
02241                         switch( Armour[ Item[ pItemNumbers[ i ] ].ubClassIndex ].ubArmourClass )
02242                         {
02243                         case( ARMOURCLASS_HELMET ):
02244                               iProtection = 15 * iProtection / Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_HELMET_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
02245                               break;
02246 
02247                         case( ARMOURCLASS_VEST ):
02248                               iProtection = 65 * iProtection / ( Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_VEST_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection + Armour[ Item[ CERAMIC_PLATES ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection );
02249                               break;
02250 
02251                         case( ARMOURCLASS_LEGGINGS ):
02252                               iProtection = 25 * iProtection / Armour[ Item[ SPECTRA_LEGGINGS_18 ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection;
02253                               break;
02254 
02255                         case( ARMOURCLASS_PLATE ):
02256                               iProtection = 65 * iProtection / ( Armour[ Item[ CERAMIC_PLATES ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection );
02257                               break;
02258                         }
02259 
02260                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s\n%s %d%% (%d)\n%s %d%%\n%s %1.1f %s",                     
02261                               ItemNames[ pItemNumbers[ i ] ],                                                     //Item long name
02262                               pInvPanelTitleStrings[ 4 ],                                                         //Protection string
02263                               iProtection,                                                                              //Protection rating in % based on best armor
02264                               Armour[ Item[ pItemNumbers[ i ] ].ubClassIndex ].ubProtection,    //Protection (raw data)
02265                               pInvPanelTitleStrings[ 3 ],                     //Camo string
02266                               Item[ pItemNumbers[ i ] ].camobonus,      //Camo bonus
02267                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],                         //Weight string
02268                               fWeight,                                              //Weight
02269                               GetWeightUnitString()                           //Weight units
02270                               );
02271                   }
02272                   break;
02273 
02274             case IC_MISC:
02275             case IC_MEDKIT:
02276             case IC_KIT:
02277             case IC_FACE:
02278             default:
02279                   // The final, and typical case, is that of an item with a percent status
02280                   {
02281                         swprintf( (wchar_t *)pStr, L"%s\n%s %1.1f %s", 
02282                               ItemNames[ pItemNumbers[ i ] ],     //Item long name
02283                               gWeaponStatsDesc[ 12 ],             //Weight String
02284                               fWeight,                                  //Weight
02285                               GetWeightUnitString()               //Weight units
02286                               );
02287                   }
02288                   break;
02289             }
02290 
02291 
02292 
02293             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gSelectedBigImageRegion[ i ], pStr );
02294             SetRegionHelpEndCallback( &gSelectedBigImageRegion[ i ], BobbyrRGunsHelpTextDoneCallBack );
02295 
02296             usPosY += BOBBYR_GRID_OFFSET;
02297       }
02298 
02299       gubNumItemsOnScreen = ubCount;
02300       gfBigImageMouseRegionCreated = TRUE;
02301 }
02302 
02303 void DeleteMouseRegionForBigImage()
02304 {
02305       UINT8 i;
02306 
02307       if( !gfBigImageMouseRegionCreated )
02308             return;
02309 
02310       for(i=0; i<gubNumItemsOnScreen; i++)
02311             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedBigImageRegion[i]);
02312 
02313       gfBigImageMouseRegionCreated = FALSE;
02314       gusOldItemNumOnTopOfPage = 65535;
02315       gubNumItemsOnScreen = 0;
02316 }
02317 
02318 
02319 void SelectBigImageRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02320 { 
02321       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02322       {
02323 
02324       }
02325       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02326       {
02327             UINT16 usItemNum = (UINT16)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02328 
02329             PurchaseBobbyRayItem( gusItemNumberForItemsOnScreen[ usItemNum] );
02330 
02331             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02332             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;           
02333       }
02334       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02335       {
02336             UINT16 usItemNum = (UINT16)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02337 
02338             UnPurchaseBobbyRayItem( gusItemNumberForItemsOnScreen[ usItemNum] );
02339             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02340             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;           
02341       }
02342       else if(iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT)
02343       {
02344             UINT16 usItemNum = (UINT16)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02345 
02346             PurchaseBobbyRayItem( gusItemNumberForItemsOnScreen[ usItemNum] );
02347             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02348             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;           
02349       }
02350       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_REPEAT)
02351       {
02352             UINT16 usItemNum = (UINT16)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
02353 
02354             UnPurchaseBobbyRayItem( gusItemNumberForItemsOnScreen[ usItemNum] );
02355             fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
02356             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;           
02357       }
02358 }
02359 
02360 
02361 
02362 void PurchaseBobbyRayItem(UINT16    usItemNumber)
02363 {
02364       UINT8 ubPurchaseNumber;
02365 
02366       ubPurchaseNumber = CheckIfItemIsPurchased(usItemNumber);
02367 
02368       //if we are in the used page
02369       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_USED )
02370       {
02371             //if there is enough inventory in stock to cover the purchase
02372             if( ubPurchaseNumber == BOBBY_RAY_NOT_PURCHASED || LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ usItemNumber ].ubQtyOnHand >= ( BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased + 1) )
02373             {
02374                   // If the item has not yet been purchased
02375                   if( ubPurchaseNumber == BOBBY_RAY_NOT_PURCHASED )
02376                   {
02377                         ubPurchaseNumber = GetNextPurchaseNumber();
02378 
02379                         if( ubPurchaseNumber != BOBBY_RAY_NOT_PURCHASED )
02380                         {
02381                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].usItemIndex = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ usItemNumber ].usItemIndex;
02382                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased = 1;
02383                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].bItemQuality = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ usItemNumber ].ubItemQuality;
02384                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].usBobbyItemIndex = usItemNumber;
02385                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].fUsed = TRUE;
02386                         }
02387                         else
02388                         {
02389                               //display error popup because the player is trying to purchase more thenn 10 items
02390                               DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, BobbyRText[ BOBBYR_MORE_THEN_10_PURCHASES ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
02391 
02392                         }
02393                   }
02394                   // Else If the item is already purchased increment purchase amount.  Only if ordering less then the max amount!
02395                   else
02396                   {
02397                         if( BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased <= BOBBY_RAY_MAX_AMOUNT_OF_ITEMS_TO_PURCHASE)
02398                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased++;
02399                   }
02400             }
02401             else
02402             {
02403                   DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, BobbyRText[ BOBBYR_MORE_NO_MORE_IN_STOCK ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
02404 
02405                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02406                         ReportBobbyROrderError( usItemNumber, ubPurchaseNumber, LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ usItemNumber ].ubQtyOnHand, BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased );
02407                   #endif
02408             }
02409       }
02410       //else the player is on a any other page except the used page
02411       else
02412       {
02413             //if there is enough inventory in stock to cover the purchase
02414             if( ubPurchaseNumber == BOBBY_RAY_NOT_PURCHASED || LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ usItemNumber ].ubQtyOnHand >= ( BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased + 1) )
02415             {
02416                   // If the item has not yet been purchased
02417                   if( ubPurchaseNumber == BOBBY_RAY_NOT_PURCHASED )
02418                   {
02419                         ubPurchaseNumber = GetNextPurchaseNumber();
02420 
02421                         if( ubPurchaseNumber != BOBBY_RAY_NOT_PURCHASED )
02422                         {
02423                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].usItemIndex = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ usItemNumber ].usItemIndex;
02424                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased = 1;
02425                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].bItemQuality = 100;
02426                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].usBobbyItemIndex = usItemNumber;
02427                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].fUsed = FALSE;
02428                         }
02429                         else
02430                         {
02431                               //display error popup because the player is trying to purchase more thenn 10 items
02432                               DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, BobbyRText[ BOBBYR_MORE_THEN_10_PURCHASES ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
02433                         }
02434                   }
02435                   // Else If the item is already purchased increment purchase amount.  Only if ordering less then the max amount!
02436                   else
02437                   {
02438                         if( BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased <= BOBBY_RAY_MAX_AMOUNT_OF_ITEMS_TO_PURCHASE)
02439                               BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased++;
02440                   }
02441             }
02442             else
02443             {
02444                   DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, BobbyRText[ BOBBYR_MORE_NO_MORE_IN_STOCK ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
02445 
02446                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
02447                         ReportBobbyROrderError( usItemNumber, ubPurchaseNumber, LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ usItemNumber ].ubQtyOnHand, BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased );
02448                   #endif
02449             }
02450       }
02451 }
02452 
02453 
02454 // Checks to see if the clicked item is already bought or not.
02455 UINT8 CheckIfItemIsPurchased(UINT16 usItemNumber)
02456 {
02457       UINT8 i;
02458 
02459       for(i=0; i<MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT; i++)
02460       {
02461             if( ( usItemNumber == BobbyRayPurchases[i].usBobbyItemIndex ) && ( BobbyRayPurchases[i].ubNumberPurchased != 0 ) && ( BobbyRayPurchases[i].fUsed == gfOnUsedPage ) )
02462                   return(i);
02463       }
02464       return(BOBBY_RAY_NOT_PURCHASED);
02465 }
02466 
02467 UINT8 GetNextPurchaseNumber()
02468 {
02469       UINT8 i;
02470 
02471       for(i=0; i<MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT; i++)
02472       {
02473             if( ( BobbyRayPurchases[i].usBobbyItemIndex == 0) && ( BobbyRayPurchases[i].ubNumberPurchased == 0 ) )
02474                   return(i);
02475       }
02476       return(BOBBY_RAY_NOT_PURCHASED);
02477 }
02478 
02479 
02480 
02481 void UnPurchaseBobbyRayItem(UINT16  usItemNumber)
02482 {
02483       UINT8 ubPurchaseNumber;
02484 
02485       ubPurchaseNumber = CheckIfItemIsPurchased(usItemNumber);
02486 
02487       if( ubPurchaseNumber != BOBBY_RAY_NOT_PURCHASED )
02488       {
02489             if( BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased > 1)
02490                   BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased--;
02491             else
02492             {
02493                   BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].ubNumberPurchased = 0;
02494                   BobbyRayPurchases[ ubPurchaseNumber ].usBobbyItemIndex = 0;
02495             }
02496       }
02497 }
02498 
02499 
02500 
02501 
02502 void BtnBobbyROrderFormCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02503 {
02504       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02505       {
02506             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02507             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02508       }
02509       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02510       {
02511             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02512             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_MAILORDER;
02513             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02514       }
02515       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
02516       {
02517             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02518             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02519       }
02520 } 
02521 
02522 void BtnBobbyRHomeButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02523 {
02524       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02525       {
02526             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02527             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02528       }
02529       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02530       {
02531             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02532             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R;
02533             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02534       }
02535       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
02536       {
02537             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02538             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02539       }
02540 } 
02541 
02542 
02543 
02544 void UpdateButtonText(UINT32  uiCurPage)
02545 {
02546       switch( uiCurPage )
02547       {
02548             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_GUNS:
02549                   if (guiCurrentGunFilterMode != -1)
02550                   {
02551                         EnableButton( guiBobbyRPageMenu[0] );
02552                   }
02553                   else
02554                   {
02555                         DisableButton( guiBobbyRPageMenu[0] );
02556                   }
02557                   break;
02558 
02559             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_AMMO:
02560                   if (guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode != -1)
02561                   {
02562                         EnableButton( guiBobbyRPageMenu[1] );
02563                   }
02564                   else
02565                   {
02566                         DisableButton( guiBobbyRPageMenu[1] );
02567                   }
02568                   break;
02569 
02570             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_ARMOR:
02571                   DisableButton( guiBobbyRPageMenu[2] );
02572                   break;
02573 
02574             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_MISC:
02575                   DisableButton( guiBobbyRPageMenu[3] );
02576                   break;
02577 
02578             case LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R_USED:
02579                   if (guiCurrentUsedFilterMode != -1)
02580                   {
02581                         EnableButton( guiBobbyRPageMenu[4] );
02582                   }
02583                   else
02584                   {
02585                         DisableButton( guiBobbyRPageMenu[4] );
02586                   }
02587                   break;
02588       }
02589 }
02590 
02591 void UpdateAmmoFilterButtons(INT32 iNewButton, INT32 iOldButton)
02592 {
02593       if (iNewButton != iOldButton)
02594       {
02595             if (iNewButton > -1)
02596             {
02597                   // Disable new Button
02598                   DisableButton(guiBobbyRFilterAmmo[iNewButton - 1]);
02599             }
02600 
02601             if (iOldButton > -1)
02602             {
02603                   // Enable old Button
02604                   EnableButton(guiBobbyRFilterAmmo[iOldButton - 1]);
02605             }
02606       }
02607 }

02661 
02662 UINT16 CalcBobbyRayCost( UINT16 usIndex, UINT16 usBobbyIndex, BOOLEAN fUsed)
02663 {
02664       DOUBLE value;
02665       if( fUsed )
02666             value = Item[ LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ usBobbyIndex ].usItemIndex ].usPrice * 
02667                                                 ( .5 + .5 * ( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ usBobbyIndex ].ubItemQuality ) / 100 ) + .5;
02668       else
02669             value = Item[ LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ usBobbyIndex ].usItemIndex ].usPrice;
02670 
02671       return( (UINT16) value);
02672 }
02673 
02674 
02675 UINT32 CalculateTotalPurchasePrice()
02676 {
02677       UINT16      i;
02678       UINT32      uiTotal = 0;
02679 
02680       for(i=0; i<MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT; i++)
02681       {
02682             //if the item was purchased
02683             if( BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased )
02684             {
02685                   uiTotal += CalcBobbyRayCost( BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].usItemIndex, BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].usBobbyItemIndex, BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].fUsed ) * BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased;
02686             }
02687       }
02688 
02689       return(uiTotal);
02690 }

02692 void DisableBobbyRButtons()
02693 {
