02695       if( gubNumPages == 0 )
02696             DisableButton( guiBobbyRNextPage );
02697       else
02698       {
02699             if( gubCurPage >= gubNumPages-1 )
02700                   DisableButton( guiBobbyRNextPage );
02701             else
02702                   EnableButton( guiBobbyRNextPage );
02703       }
02704             
02705 
02706       // if it is the first page, disable the prev page buitton
02707       if( gubCurPage == 0 )
02708             DisableButton( guiBobbyRPreviousPage );
02709       else
02710             EnableButton( guiBobbyRPreviousPage );
02711 
02712 /*
02713       //if it is the last page, disable the next page button
02714       if( !(gusCurWeaponIndex < (gusLastItemIndex - BOBBYR_NUM_WEAPONS_ON_PAGE) ) )
02715             DisableButton( guiBobbyRNextPage );
02716       else
02717             EnableButton( guiBobbyRNextPage );
02718             
02719 
02720       // if it is the first page, disable the prev page buitton
02721       if( (gusCurWeaponIndex == gusFirstItemIndex ) )
02722             DisableButton( guiBobbyRPreviousPage );
02723       else
02724             EnableButton( guiBobbyRPreviousPage );
02725 */
02726 }
02727 
02728 void CalcFirstIndexForPage( STORE_INVENTORY *pInv, UINT32   uiItemClass )
02729 {
02730       UINT16      i;
02731       UINT16      usNumItems=0;
02732       BOOLEAN bCntItem = FALSE;
02733       UINT32 usItemIndex = 0;
02734 
02735       //Reset the Current weapon Index
02736       gusCurWeaponIndex = 0;
02737 
02738       if( uiItemClass == BOBBYR_USED_ITEMS )
02739       {
02740             //Get to the first index on the page
02741             for(i=gusFirstItemIndex; i<=gusLastItemIndex; i++)
02742             {
02743                   bCntItem = FALSE;
02744 
02745                   if (guiCurrentUsedFilterMode == -1)
02746                   {
02747                         bCntItem = TRUE;
02748                   }
02749                   else
02750                   {
02751                         usItemIndex = pInv[ i ].usItemIndex;
02752 
02753                         switch (guiCurrentUsedFilterMode)
02754                         {
02755                               case IC_BOBBY_GUN:
02756                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_GUN ||
02757                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_LAUNCHER)
02758                                     {
02759                                           bCntItem = TRUE;
02760                                     }
02761                                     break;
02762                               case IC_AMMO:
02763                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_AMMO)
02764                                     {
02765                                           bCntItem = TRUE;
02766                                     }
02767                                     break;
02768                               case IC_ARMOUR:
02769                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_ARMOUR)
02770                                     {
02771                                           bCntItem = TRUE;
02772                                     }
02773                                     break;
02774                               case IC_BOBBY_MISC:
02775                                     if (Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_BLADE ||
02776                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE ||
02777                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_PUNCH ||
02778                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_GRENADE ||
02779                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_BOMB ||
02780                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_MISC ||
02781                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_MEDKIT ||
02782                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_KIT ||
02783                                           Item[usItemIndex].usItemClass == IC_FACE)
02784                                     {
02785                                           bCntItem = TRUE;
02786                                     }
02787                                     break;
02788                         }
02789                   }
02790 
02791                   //If we have some of the inventory on hand
02792                   if( pInv[ i ].ubQtyOnHand != 0 )
02793                   {
02794                         if (bCntItem == TRUE)
02795                         {
02796                               if( gubCurPage == 0 )
02797                               {
02798                                     gusCurWeaponIndex = i;
02799                                     break;
02800                               }
02801 
02802                               if( usNumItems <= ( gubCurPage * 4 ) )
02803                                     gusCurWeaponIndex = i;
02804 
02805                               usNumItems++;
02806                         }
02807                   }
02808             }
02809       }
02810       else
02811       {
02812             //Get to the first index on the page
02813             for(i=gusFirstItemIndex; i<=gusLastItemIndex; i++)
02814             {
02815                   bCntItem = FALSE;
02816 
02817                   if( Item[ pInv[ i ].usItemIndex ].usItemClass & uiItemClass )
02818                   {
02819                         if (uiItemClass == IC_BOBBY_GUN)
02820                         {
02821                               if (guiCurrentGunFilterMode == -1)
02822                               {
02823                                     bCntItem = TRUE;
02824                               }
02825                               else
02826                               {
02827                                     usItemIndex = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].usItemIndex;
02828 
02829                                     if (Weapon[ Item[usItemIndex].ubClassIndex ].ubWeaponType == guiCurrentGunFilterMode)
02830                                     {
02831                                           bCntItem = TRUE;
02832                                     }
02833                               }
02834                         }
02835                         else if (uiItemClass == IC_AMMO)
02836                         {
02837                               if (guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode == -1)
02838                               {
02839                                     bCntItem = TRUE;
02840                               }
02841                               else
02842                               {
02843                                     usItemIndex = LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].usItemIndex;
02844 
02845                                     if (IsAmmoMatchinWeaponType(usItemIndex, guiCurrentAmmoFilterMode))
02846                                     {
02847                                           bCntItem = TRUE;
02848                                     }
02849                                     
02850                               }
02851                         }
02852                         else if (uiItemClass == IC_ARMOUR)
02853                         {
02854                               if (guiCurrentArmourFilterMode == -1)
02855                               {
02856                                     bCntItem = TRUE;
02857                               }
02858                               else
02859                               {
02860                                     // TODO
02861                               }
02862                         }
02863                         else if (uiItemClass == IC_BOBBY_MISC)
02864                         {
02865                               if (guiCurrentMiscFilterMode == -1)
02866                               {
02867                                     bCntItem = TRUE;
02868                               }
02869                               else
02870                               {
02871                                     // TODO
02872                               }
02873                         }
02874 
02875                         //If we have some of the inventory on hand
02876                         if( pInv[ i ].ubQtyOnHand != 0 )
02877                         {
02878                               if (bCntItem == TRUE)
02879                               {
02880                                     if( gubCurPage == 0 )
02881                                     {
02882                                           gusCurWeaponIndex = i;
02883                                           break;
02884                                     }
02885 
02886                                     if( usNumItems <= ( gubCurPage * 4 ) )
02887                                           gusCurWeaponIndex = i;
02888 
02889                                     usNumItems++;
02890                               }
02891                         }
02892                   }
02893             }
02894       }
02895 }
02896 
02897 BOOLEAN IsAmmoMatchinWeaponType(UINT16 usItemIndex, UINT8 ubWeaponType) 
02898 {
02899       // usItemIndex == Ammo
02900 
02901       BOOLEAN bRetValue = FALSE;
02902 
02903       UINT32      i;
02904       
02905       for (i = 0; i < MAXITEMS; i++)
02906       {
02907             //if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ i ].ubQtyOnHand != 0 )
02908             {
02909                   // We found the Weapon that uses this Ammo
02910                   if (Magazine[ Item[ usItemIndex ].ubClassIndex ].ubCalibre == Weapon[i].ubCalibre)
02911                   {
02912                         // Weapon has the correct filter ammo weapon type
02913                         if (Weapon[i].ubWeaponType == ubWeaponType)
02914                         {
02915                               //Weapon has correct magazine size
02916                               if(Weapon[i].ubMagSize == Magazine[Item[usItemIndex].ubClassIndex].ubMagSize )
02917                               {
02918                                   bRetValue = TRUE;
02919                                     break;
02920                               }
02921                         }
02922                         // Weapon has another filter ammo weapon type
02923                         /*
02924                         else
02925                         {
02926                               bRetValue = FALSE;
02927                         }
02928                         break;
02929                         */
02930                   }
02931             }
02932       }
02933 
02934       return bRetValue;
02935 }

02947 
02948 
02949 UINT8 CheckPlayersInventoryForGunMatchingGivenAmmoID( INT16 sItemID )
02950 {
02951       UINT8 ubItemCount=0;
02952       UINT8 ubMercCount;
02953       UINT8 ubPocketCount;
02954 
02955       UINT8 ubFirstID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
02956       UINT8 ubLastID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
02957 
02958 
02959       //loop through all the mercs on the team
02960       for( ubMercCount = ubFirstID; ubMercCount <= ubLastID; ubMercCount++ )
02961       {
02962             if( Menptr[ ubMercCount ].bActive )
02963             {
02964                   //loop through all the pockets on the merc
02965                   for( ubPocketCount=0; ubPocketCount<NUM_INV_SLOTS; ubPocketCount++)
02966                   {
02967                         //if there is a weapon here
02968                         if( Item[ Menptr[ ubMercCount ].inv[ ubPocketCount ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
02969                         {
02970                               //if the weapon uses the same kind of ammo as the one passed in, return true
02971                               if( Weapon[ Menptr[ ubMercCount ].inv[ ubPocketCount ].usItem ].ubCalibre == Magazine[ Item[ sItemID ].ubClassIndex ].ubCalibre )
02972                               {
02973                                     ubItemCount++;
02974                               }
02975                         }
02976                   }
02977             }
02978       }
02979 
02980       return( ubItemCount );
02981 }
